attributes.action: Stop funding the war in Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: There dragging the country into a war that is nothing to do with us
attributes.background: Stop sending uk tax payers money to Ukraine focus on our own problems here at home

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Stop sending military aid to Ukraine 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702525
